Firstly, if you're in the mood for a high-stakes adventure with a hint of wrong-doing (just like earlier!), I'd suggest "Pain & Gain" (2013). This movie features Dwayne Johnson and Michael Rispoli as bodybuilders who get caught up in an extortion ring - it's a wild ride!

Alternatively, if you're looking for a classic adventure film with a strong sense of nostalgia and camaraderie, I think "Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade" (1989) would be an excellent choice. This movie has all the hallmarks of a great Indiana Jones adventure, including memorable characters, action-packed sequences, and a dash of humor.

Let me know if either of these piques your interest!
